parameter.name: name
parameter.description: User recognizable name for the Account.

parameter.name: accountType
parameter.description: A detailed account classification that specifies the use of this account.

parameter.name: accountSubType
parameter.description: The account sub-type classification and is based on the AccountType value.

parameter.name: subAccount
parameter.description: Specifies the Account is a SubAccount or Not.

parameter.name: parentRef
parameter.description: Specifies the Parent AccountId if this represents a SubAccount.

parameter.name: description
parameter.description: User entered description for the account.

parameter.name: fullyQualifiedName
parameter.description: Fully qualified name of the entity.

parameter.name: active
parameter.description: Whether or not active inactive accounts may be hidden from most display purposes and may not be posted to.

parameter.name: openingBalance
parameter.description: Specifies the openning balance amount for the current Account

parameter.name: openingBalanceDate
parameter.description: Date of when the above openingBalance amount exists.

parameter.name: currencyRef
parameter.description: Reference to the Currency in which this account holds the amounts.
